body_html: This is a documentation issue. .sample() expects a rank 1 Tensor (or something convertible to that) specifying a shape. So the scalar case was not intended to be handled. I'm fixing the docs now.
body_text: This is a documentation issue.  .sample() expects a rank 1 Tensor (or something convertible to that) specifying a shape.  So the scalar case was not intended to be handled.  I'm fixing the docs now.
body: This is a documentation issue.  `.sample()` expects a rank 1 Tensor (or something convertible to that) specifying a shape.  So the scalar case was not intended to be handled.  I'm fixing the docs now.
